data.eml:eml: Revision of the snailfish genus Allocareproctus Pitruk & Fedorov (Teleostei: Liparidae), with descriptions of four new species from the Aleutian Islands

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Orr, James Wilder, Busby, Morgan Scott (2006): Revision of the snailfish genus Allocareproctus Pitruk & Fedorov (Teleostei: Liparidae), with descriptions of four new species from the Aleutian Islands. Zootaxa 1173: 1-37, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.2645716
